title: Chris Daughtry
summary: Christopher Adam Daughtry (born December 26, 1979) is an American singer, musician, and actor. He is the lead vocalist and rhythm guitarist for the rock band Daughtry, which he formed after placing fourth on the fifth season of American Idol. Released by RCA Records, Daughtry's self-titled debut album became the fastest selling debut rock album in Nielsen SoundScan history,[2] selling more than one million copies within five weeks of release. The album was recorded before the band was officially formed, making him the only official member present on the album.
